name: Free Booking System
author: ikaroa

sections.description:
Perfect for any business that requires taking bookings and/or charging for them.

No more wasting time on boring tasks

Sign up for free and you will never lose another appointment just because you forgot to note or missed a call. Cut unnecessary paperwork and allocate your resources more efficiently on what matters, your customers.

Let BookOnline.live generate leads for you

Easily connect with your existing clients or registered users with a streamlined appointment booking funnel for potential customers! We built the best appointment booking system we know, it saves all customer data with their entire booking history and payment details.

On Your Customer\’s Terms

Remove all the hustle and bustle with self-scheduling. Share your available timing and let your customers decide the right time that works for them. BookOnline.live is open 24/7 and will continue to receive your bookings beyond your normal working hours.
sections.installation:
Step 1

Install the plugin

Step 2

Visit https://bookonline.live/signup and set up your FREE profile
Set your booking URL
Business Information, Services etc

If you get stuck at any point, feel free to refer to our YouTube videos at: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCPdfF0KriWcp6qPzGH8JCxg

You can also contact us at https://bookonline.live/contact

short_description: Automate your booking process by allowing your customers to choose a slot that works best for them and book in seconds.
